Body: I have a Nokia Lumia 920. I can't dwnld any apps incl. an update needed for Firefox as it says I "don't have any devices". I don't know what made it unrecog. my device. I have chkd other places but they suggest uninstalling google play. I can't do that as it is not listed in my apps list. I had prev. dwnlded apps fine awhile ago. Everytime I try to dwnld an app it says I don't have my devices. It sends me to a page that says I need to update my browser which I can't do since it doesn't recog. my device. I can't get into device mgr bec. It doesn't recog. my device.Can you please help me?
Title: googoogleplay says I have no device when it had recognized it previously

history.Text: I have a Nokia Lumia 920. I cannot download any apps including an update needed for Firefox as it does not recognize my device anymore. I don't know what made it unrecognize my device. I have checked other places but they suggest uninstalling google play. I cannot do that as it is not listed in my apps list. Can you please help me?
My device is not recognized on googleplay.
My device is not recognized on googleplay

Everytime I try to download an app it says device not recognized. It then sends me to a page that says I need to update my browser which I cannot do since it doesn't recognize my device. Can you please help me?
